metadata.title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Zante Solas V1 Running Shoe
description: Not only is the fresh foam Zante solas the newest member of the innovative New Balance fresh foam family, it's the lightest, bounciest and most flexible of the collection. The running shoe for men was designed with an incredibly sleek sock like design to take up-tempo runs and fast trainings up a notch.

New Balance, is dedicated to helping athletes achieve their goals. It's been their mission for more than a century. It's why they don't spend money on celebrity endorsements. They spend it on research and development. It's why they don't design products to fit an image. They design them to fit. New Balance is driven to make the finest shoes for the same reason athletes lace them up: to achieve the very best.
metadata.details: {"Item Weight": "4.2 Ounces", "Item model number": "WZANSBB", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "January 10, 2019", "Manufacturer": "New Balance"}
